attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: properly fund HI Tech Crime within Local Police forces from the HOME OFFICE,At present these units are funded ad hoc by regional; forces and as in our unit does not have a budget. bring back a National HI Tech Crime Unit that can work with local HI Tech Crime Units.

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
